title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average expenditure in U.S. dollars, with a total of 3 data points.
Overall Average expenditure in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average expenditure in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Average expenditure in U.S. dollars about 77.6 was recorded at Year 2016
Min Average expenditure in U.S. dollars about 60.95 was recorded at Year 2014
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average expenditure in U.S. dollars with a total of 3 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2016 to 2014.
